Song.title: Holy, Holy, Holy
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Reginald Heber and John Dykes Public domain

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]hol[C]y! [F]Lord God Al[C]mighty [G/B]Early in[C] th[G]e mo[Am]r[D7]ni[G/B]ng, our [C]song[G/D] shall rise t[D7]o Thee [G7] [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]hol[C]y! [F]Merciful and [C]mighty [Am]God [C/E]in three pe[F]rso[C]ns, Bl[F]essed Tr[G]init[C]y
VERSE 2: [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]hol[C]y! [F]All the saints a[C]dore Thee [G/B]Casting do[C]wn th[G]eir go[Am]lde[D7]n cr[G/B]owns, a[C]roun[G/D]d the glassy[D7] sea [G7] [C]Cheru[Am]bim and [G]sera[C]phim, [F]falling down be[C]fore Thee [Am]Who [C/E]wert and ar[F]t an[C]d ev[F]ermo[G]re sh[C]all be
VERSE 3: [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]hol[C]y! [F]Tho'the darkness [C]hide Thee [G/B]Tho'the ey[C]e of[G] si[Am]nfu[D7]l ma[G/B]n, Thy [C]glor[G/D]y may no[D7]t see [G7] [C]Only [Am]Thou art [G]hol[C]y, [F]There is none be[C]side Thee [Am]Per[C/E]fect in po[F]w'r, in[C] lo[F]ve and pu[G]rit[C]y
{key:D} VERSE 4: [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]hol[C]y! [F]Lord God Al[C]mighty [G/B]All thy[C] work[G]s shall pr[Am]aise Th[D7]y na[G/B]me, in e[C]art[G/D]h and sky an[D7]d sea [G7] [D]Holy, [Bm]holy, [A]hol[D]y! [G]Merciful and [D]mighty [Am]God [C/E]in th[C]ree pe[F]rso[C]ns, Bl[F]essed Tr[G]init[C]y
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 holy holy holy lord god almighty early in the morning our song shall rise to thee holy holy holy merciful and mighty god in three persons blessed trinity verse 2 holy holy holy all the saints adore thee casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea cherubim and seraphim falling down before thee who wert and art and evermore shall be verse 3 holy holy holy thothe darkness hide thee thothe eye of sinful man thy glory may not see only thou art holy there is none beside thee perfect in powr in love and purity verse 4 holy holy holy lord god almighty all thy works shall praise thy name in earth and sky and sea holy holy holy merciful and mighty god in three persons blessed trinity

Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]ho[C]ly! [F]Lord God Al[C]mighty [G/B]Early [C]in [G/B]the [Am]mor[D7][G/B]ning, [C]our [G/D]song shall [D7]rise to [G]Thee [G7] [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]ho[C]ly! [F]Merciful and [C]mighty [Am]God [C/E]in three [F]per[C]sons, [Dm/F]Blessed [G]Trini[C]ty
VERSE 2: [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]ho[C]ly! [F]All the saints a[C]dore Thee [G/B]Casting [C]down [G/B]their [Am]gol[D7]den [G/B]crowns, [C]a[G/D]round the [D7]glassy [G]sea [G7] [C]Cheru[Am]bim and [G]sera[C]phim, [F]falling down be[C]fore Thee [Am]Who [C/E]wert and [F]art [C]and [Dm/F]ever[G]more shall [C]be
VERSE 3: [C]Holy, [Am]holy, [G]ho[C]ly! [F]Tho' the darkness [C]hide Thee [G/B]Tho' the [C]eye [G/B]of [Am]sin[D7]ful [G/B]man [C]Thy [G/D]glory [D7]may not [G]see [G7] [C]Only [Am]Thou art [G]ho[C]ly: [F]there is none be[C]side Thee [Am]Per[C/E]fect in [F]pow'r, [C]in [Dm/F]love and [G]puri[C]ty
VERSE 4: [D]Holy, [Bm]holy, [A]ho[D]ly! [G]Lord God Al[D/F#]mighty [A/C#]All thy [D]works [A/C#]shall [Bm]praise [E7]Thy [A/C#]name, [D]in [A/E]earth and [E7]sky and [A]sea [A7] [D]Holy, [Bm]holy, [A]ho[D]ly! [G]Merciful and [D]mighty [Bm]God [D/F#]in three [G]per[D]sons, [Em/G]Blessed [A]Trini[D]ty
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 holy holy holy lord god almighty early in the morning our song shall rise to thee holy holy holy merciful and mighty god in three persons blessed trinity verse 2 holy holy holy all the saints adore thee casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea cherubim and seraphim falling down before thee who wert and art and evermore shall be verse 3 holy holy holy tho the darkness hide thee tho the eye of sinful man thy glory may not see only thou art holy there is none beside thee perfect in powr in love and purity verse 4 holy holy holy lord god almighty all thy works shall praise thy name in earth and sky and sea holy holy holy merciful and mighty god in three persons blessed trinity
